channel.title: Environment variables?
channel.description:
ok so i had to format my computer because of a virus screwing my windows installation, and i thought i'd get back to programming. so i install java and everything, and it's time to set my Path variables.
now when i try to set something, it looks like it's edited. then when i close the window, nothing's changed. it's still the same value and my CLASSPATH variable is not even there. any help with this guys? i'm debating having a fll scan of my computer for viruses but i'm kind of working on a project now and scans always lag my computer, so i'm waiting for confirmation.

item.title: Environment variables?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

ok so i had to format my computer because of a virus screwing my windows installation, and i thought i’d get back to programming. so i install java and everything, and it’s time to set my Path variables.

now when i try to set something, it looks like it’s edited. then when i close the window, nothing’s changed. it’s still the same value and my CLASSPATH variable is not even there. any help with this guys? i’m debating having a fll scan of my computer for viruses but i’m kind of working on a project now and scans always lag my computer, so i’m waiting for confirmation.
